title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 156.9 - No State guaranty
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 156.9 - No State guaranty

State Regulations
ANY ABLE account is not insured by the State and neither the
principal deposited, the payment of interest nor investment or other return is
guaranteed by the State. The NY ABLE account savings agreement, the program
disclosure booklet an d every contract, application and similar document that
may be used in connection with a contribution to an account shall clearly
indicate that the account is not insured or guaranteed by the State. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
156.9

Adopted

New

York State Register July 12, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 28, eff. 7/12/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
